name: ArtMuseum
0:
”Alexa, open Art Museum”
”Alexa, launch Art Museum”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: art museum
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Art Museum allows you to discover artwork from around the world using your voice. Featuring a curated collection from the Art Institute of Chicago, this multimodal skill lets you explore the offerings of a world renowned Art Museum using simple language.
 
Best experienced with an Echo Show or other multimodal Alexa enabled device – allowing you to view each piece up close, and listen along to rich audio commentary along the way.
 
Explore by categories and origins -- like European paintings, or sculptures from Asia. With 300+ pieces of art in the collection, you can move through an entire gallery or choose a different category or origin at any time to keep exploring.

All featured media is in the Public Domain and available from the Art Institute of Chicago Public API.

Additional Creative Commons licensed photography of the museum exterior and interior sourced via Flickr from Wally Gobetz, Chris Smith, Peter Miller, Bill Dickinson, Katerina Atha, Sky Noir, Paul Savala, Mark B. Schlemmer, and Damian Entwistle.

Created by Katy B and John G
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
